The app has three tabs: Top News, Most Popular, and Politics News. The app opens in the Top News tab.
Each tab shows a list of news relevant to the tab.
Clicking the Search Button in the Action Bar displays a search menu with a Query field, Begin Date field, End Date field, and checkboxes for categories.
Clicking SEARCH shows a list of news relevant to the search criteria.
Search criteria is saved whenever the SEARCH button is clicked.
Clicking the Notifications option in the Overflow Menu displays a Query field, checkboxes for categories, and a switch to decide whether to enable notifications.
Clicking SAVE saves the criteria. If the Notification Switch is turned on when SAVE is clicked, a daily notification is sent if new news matches the criteria.
News Lists appear when a tab is selected, when a search is performed, or when the app is opened by clicking a notification.
Clicking an item in a News List displays the relevant webpage for that item.
A Back Arrow appears when clicking an item in the News List. Clicking the Back Arrow closes the webpage and returns to the News List.

Clicking a Notification opens the app to a News List matching what would be displayed if a search were performed using the criteria set when enabling notifications, and using yesterday and today as the Begin Date and End Date.
